channel.title: Ahnaf Karim - Labs and other Classwork
channel.description: This website contains links to all labs completed in addition to other classwork assignments.

item.title: Lab 1 - Setup
item.description: Lab 1 was an introductory lab in which we installed and began running Microsoft Azure, Github, and our Terminal.

item.title: Lab 2 - Resume
item.description: For Lab 2 we were tasked with looking at sample resume and then making our own. The purpose of this was for us to familiarize ourselves with the process of building a website.

item.title: Lab 3 - Website
item.description: In this lab we were assigned with creating a website with a homepage, folders containing labs and other assignments, and the option to click on the lab section and view all of the labs with a synopsis of what was assigned for each lab.

item.title: Lab 4 - RSS Feed
item.description: The purpose of Lab 04 was to create an RSS feed containing links to all of our Labs.
